channel.title: neopixels on Monkey See Monkey Do
channel.description: Recent content in neopixels on Monkey See Monkey Do

item.title: Wireless Neopixels With Esp32 and Artnet
item.description: Here’s how to set up ESP32 devices as a wireless access point, Art-Net server and Art-Net Nodes, to control neo-pixels wirelessly with DMX. These are the devices we’ll be coding: ESP32 Access Point - creates the Art-Net wireless newtork. ESP32 Art-Net Node - connects to the ESP32 Access Point and receves DMX data, which it sents to connected neopixels. ESP32 Art-Net Server - connects to the ESP32 Access Point and sending DMX data to the ESP32 Nodes.
